Manifest Link.description: Function that registers the service worker
body: .catch(e => console.error('Error during service worker registration:', e));

Service Worker.description: A service worker ready to accept the precache list from workbox-build
body: const workboxSW = new WorkboxSW({ clientsClaim: true });
* precache() is passed a manifest of URLs and versions
* each time the service worker starts up.
* Use workbox-build to generate the manifest

PWA Push Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the push event

PWA Sync Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the sync event

PWA Notification Click Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the notificationclick event

PWA Push Subscription Change Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the pushsubscriptionchange event

PWA Install Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the install event

PWA Load Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the load event

PWA Activate Change Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the activate event

PWA Fetch Change Event.description: Create an event listener that handles the fetch event
